title: What's the best font management program for multipule PCs?
content:
I have 2 PCs which I would like to share the same fonts. The only application I know of which can sync fonts between computers is Extensis Type Server.

I am responsible and am able to keep up with purchasing licenses for every computer I sync fonts to.

Does anyone know of anything that can handle this?
author: JoshuaSortino

comments.content: [Many different threads have debated just this topic.](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103113246/http:/www.google.com/search?hl=en&ei=Ti0gS9a9JYK0sgPDxa3_CQ&sa=X&oi=spell&resnum=0&ct=result&cd=1&ved=0CAgQBSgA&q=site%3Atypophile.com+PC+Windows+Font+Management&spell=1) :)
I understand it that Joshua has a special requirement (font synchronising) that is not covered in the general font manager threads. Andreas
